titleStmt.title: The history of the life and death of Pope Joane who was elected to the papacy, an. 855, under the name of Johannes Anglus of Mentz in Germany : published as an advertisement to all papists / faithfully collected and asserted by H.J., Gent.
titleStmt.author: H. J.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
